#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
char str[100001];
int main()
{
int task;
scanf("%d",&task);
vector<int>v;
vector<char>v2;
getchar();
while(task--)
{
   gets(str);
   for(int i=0;str[i];i++)
        if(str[i]>='0'&&str[i]<='9')
        v.push_back(str[i]-48);
        else
            v2.push_back(str[i]);
   sort(v.begin(),v.end());
   sort(v2.begin(),v2.end());
   int y=0,l=0;
   for(int i=0;str[i];i++)
    if(str[i]>='0'&&str[i]<='9')
        printf("%d",v[y++]);
    else
        printf("%c",v2[l++]);
    printf("\n");
    v.clear();
    v2.clear();
}
}
